headline: RGP Launches rIQ, Proprietary AI Accelerator Built on ServiceNow
summary: DALLAS, September 30, 2025--RGP has launched rIQ, a proprietary AI accelerator that powers GenAI with the data and logic needed to deliver more accurate service solutions.

headline: Plutus Secures Investment from ServiceNow Ventures to Accelerate Agentic AI Innovation for the Insurance Industry
summary: Founded by former ServiceNow executives Chirag Jindal (CEO) , Kara Anderson (COO) , and Abhishek Bajpai (CTO) , Plutus delivers pre-configured, AI-native solutions to modernize claims, underwriting, and servicing processes for P&C, L&A, and broker ecosystems.

headline: Procare Solutions Appoints Sam Loveland as Chief Customer Officer
summary: Procare Solutions, a leader in child care management software, announced the appointment of Sam Loveland as Chief Customer Officer. In this role, Loveland will be responsible for advancing the customer experience and enabling early childhood education providers to maximize the benefits of Procare.

headline: ServiceNow, Inc. (NOW): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on ServiceNow, Inc. on Compounding Your Wealth’s Substack by Sergey. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NOW. ServiceNow, Inc.’s share was trading at $933.37 as of September 24th. NOW’s trailing and forward P/E were 117.41 and 46.30 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: ServiceNow Unveils AI Experience, the UI for Enterprise AI
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., September 30, 2025--ServiceNow announced AI Experience, a unified, conversational front door to enterprise AI.

headline: Stardog Appoints former ServiceNow Executive Craig Harper as Chief Executive Officer to Lead Next Phase of Growth
summary: NEW YORK, Sept. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Stardog, a leading Data & AI company that enables organizations to unlock the full potential of their data for AI-driven initiatives, today announced the appointment of Craig Harper as Chief Executive Officer. Harper has served as an advisor to the board for the previous two years. headline: Fortune And ServiceNow Reveal the 2025 Fortune AIQ 50 List, Sponsored by ServiceNow
summary: Today, Fortune and ServiceNow unveil the inaugural FortuneAIQ 50 List, a definitive ranking of Fortune 500 companies that are generating significant and measurable impact with artificial intelligence. Together, these companies' strategies form an essential roadmap for leaders steering organizations through today's era of AI-driven transformation. ServiceNow's 2025 Enterprise AI Maturity Index research served as the foundation for the methodology behind the Fortune AIQ 50 List.
